FuncDef:
The radius-attribute enable framed-ip-netmask account-request command configures a device to add a 32-bit Framed-IP-Netmask attribute to an Accounting-Request packet.
The undo radius-attribute enable framed-ip-netmask account-request restores the default configuration.
By default, an Accounting-Request packet does not carry a 32-bit Framed-IP-Netmask attribute.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the length of the Framed-IP-Netmask attribute.
The value is an integer 32, in bits.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to send a 32-bit Framed-IP mask to a RADIUS server, run the radius-attribute enable command to encapsulate the 32-bit Framed-IP mask into a 32-bit Framed-IP-Netmask attribute in an Accounting-Request packet and send the packet to the RADIUS server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
